text: Santadi (Santàdi) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 3,439 people lived there. Its area is 116.49 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 135 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Santadi
